name: tm57
effect: Teaches Charge Beam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Charge Beam to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.
